text: Clubul Sportiv Municipal Târgu Mureș, commonly known as CSM Târgu Mureș, or simply Târgu Mureș, is a Romanian basketball club based in Târgu Mureș, currently participates in the Liga Națională, the top-tier league in Romania. The club is the men's basketball department of CSM Târgu Mureș, a multi-sport club founded on 19 December 2017 in order to bring back to life the sport from the city, which went almost completely into bankruptcy during the 2017–18 season.La Tîrgu Mureş s-a înfiinţat un Club Sportiv Municipal. punctul.ro Finanțare de peste 8 milioane de lei pentru CSM. zi-de-zi.ro Men's basketball section of CSM started its activity in the summer of 2018 and was enrolled in the Group C of Liga Națională continuing the tradition started by its predecessor, BC Mureș.Primele informații despre CSM Tîrgu Mureș. 24secunde.ro ==Current roster== ==References== ==External links== * * CSM Târgu Mureș at totalbaschet.ro * CSM Târgu Mureș at baschetromania.ro Category:2018 establishments in Romania Category:Basketball teams in Romania Category:Basketball teams established in 2018
title: CSM Târgu Mureș (men's basketball)
